descriptions.description: Step 1. Click to locate which store you are inside.
Step 2. If the user was in a store, they were shown the sign up form.
Step 3. If a user was not in a store, they were shown Google Maps links to the 5 nearest locations.
Step 4. After sign up, users could then pull the sheet down to reveal a potential prize.
Step 5. All non mattress wins were given a discount code offer.
Step 6. All users were emailed their offer or win code.
